tags: maybe i'm interpreting this wrong but anyway
someone take me off tumblr when it’s past midnight bc I’m just blabbering nonsense at this point
summary: Ok but can we talk about maxence for a second. He was so anxious and scared before that screening tonight and you could...
body: Ok but can we talk about maxence for a second. He was so anxious and scared before that screening tonight and you could literally see the nervous insecure smile on his face and he couldn’t stand still throughout that little interview part on the instagram account, poor little angel. And then at the Q&A he still seemed so nervous and his voice seemed a bit shaky and he spoke much faster than normal?? But then every time he reassured himself that axel was there next to him and whenever he put his hand on axel’s shoulder/hugged him or looked at him he seemed a bit more at ease?? And I think that’s just such a beautiful little aspect of their friendship. Also, just in general, the fact that maxence is so sweet and affectionate and loves giving hugs and resting his arms on axel’s shoulder and buries his face in axel’s neck in interviews is just so endearing?? He has such a big warm heart and deserves all the love and happiness in the universe. But then also when axel came into the room he gave maxence a kiss on the cheek and it was just the most normal thing ever and I don’t even know where I’m going with this anymore but honestly they are restoring my faith in humanity. These two are literally saying fuck you to toxic masculinity and I’m living for it.

He has such a big warm heart and deserves all the love and happiness in the universe. blog.name: srodvlv
blog.title: be kind.
blog.description: i've been here for over 8 years. sorry for the mess. current hyperfixation: #skamfrance.

summary: omg did you meet the actors? how are they? anything about Axel and Maxence irl to share? 👀
question: omg did you meet the actors? how are they? anything about Axel and Maxence irl to share? 👀
answer:
I didn’t, I wasn’t there, my friend sent me the pics and videos for which i’m forever grateful. 

She said emotions were running high, lots of people cried. There was a big rush at the end to give everyone hugs and cuddles. There were a lot of teary eyes by the end of the screening, including among the actors, especially Lula (Daphné) and Coline (Alexia), I think. 

About the guys, she said that Maxence and Axel seem really close. They sat next to one another and Maxence is a bit more tactile than Axel is and a big softie. She was sitting just behind them so she could see pretty well. He was squirmming/jumping in his seat during the first kiss scene. He kinda melted into his seat during the scene when Eliott doesn’t show up to paint the wall and leaves Lucas hanging.

She also told me that Axel’s hair is a mess, that he’s always running his hands in it, and that he is very energetic, jumping from the stage to give people the mic and running around bahaha. And also that (spoilers), they shooted more than that one scene at the bridge/la petite ceinture.

About the guys, she said that Maxence and Axel seem really close. They sat next to one another and Maxence is a bit more tactile than Axel is and a big softie. blog.name: plus-peur
blog.title: tu choisis de qui tu tombes amoureux, toi?
blog.description:
Just your friendly neighborhood skam side blog. 
I'm Lara, 21, main is @breakthebeam

tags: first post on here cause i dont get this emotional on main
follow for more feelings brought on by skam
non mais serieux cet episode m'a achevee
body:
Yall I cried so hard

Watching this show keeps taking me back 2, 3 years to when I was coming out myself but this one hit especially hard because it reminded me of how sometimes I would be with friends and just want to scream. Like we’d be doing regular stuff, just hanging out but my head would be somewhere else completely and all I wanted to do was scream my head off. Maybe punch a wall too. I just felt so alone. And tonight, skam captured that feeling. I just wanted to reach out through the screen, give Lucas a hug and cry with him and tell him it gets better.
